description: FFV1 is a lossless intra-frame codec from the FFmpeg project. The description states that FFV1 is a "simple and efficient lossless intra only codec," meaning that the compression is applied within each frame as opposed to inter-frame compression which is applied over groups of frames.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: FF Video Codec 1
